price: Wͻ’nsa bεka deε wͻpε biara wͻhͻ, na (akyεdeε) pii nso wͻ Yεn hͻ a yεde bεka wͻn ho.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
